executable.title: FitFissureSurfaceModelToParticleData
executable.description: This program is used to fit a left oblique shape model to fissure \ particles data. It is expected that the input shape model is generated with the 'GenerateFissureShapeModels' \ program. The output shape model has the same form as the input shape model, but it indicates how much to \ weight each of the primary modes of variation in order to achieve a good fit to the particles data.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and women's hospital
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded by the National Heart, Lung, And Blood Institute of the National \ Institutes of Health under Award Number R01HL116931. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors \ and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.

string.name: leftFissureParticlesFileName
string.label: Left lung fissure particles file name
string.description: Left lung fissure particles file name

string.name: leftVesselParticlesFileName
string.label: Left lung vessel particles file name
string.description: Left lung vessel particles file name

string.label: Left lung airway particles file name
string.description: Left lung airway particles file name

string.label: Right lung vessel particles file name
string.description: Right lung vessel particles file name

string.label: Right lung airway particles file name
string.description: Right lung airway particles file name

string.name: inLeftModelFileName
string.label: Input left lobes surface model file name
string.description: Input left lobes surface model file name

string.name: inRightModelFileName
string.label: Input right lobes surface model file name
string.description: Input right lobes surface model file name

string.label: Output left lobes surface model file name

string.label: Output right lobes surface model file name
string.description: Output right lobes surface model file name

double.name: shapeVarianceThreshold
double.description: Shape variance threshold. This indicates how much of \ the variance you want accounted for during the shape model fitting process
double.label: Shape Variance Threshold

double.name: fissureSigmaDistance
double.description: Fissure sigma distance value for the TPS to particles optimization
double.label: Fissure Sigma Distance

double.name: vesselSigmaDistance
double.description: Vessel sigma distance value for the TPS to particles optimization
double.label: Vessel Sigma Distance

double.name: airwaySigmaDistance
double.description: Airway sigma distance value for the TPS to particles optimization
double.label: Aissure Sigma Distance

double.name: fissureSigmaTheta
double.description: Fissure sigma theta value for the TPS to particles optimization
double.label: Fissure Sigma Theta

double.name: vesselSigmaTheta
double.description: Vessel sigma theta value for the TPS to particles optimization
double.label: Vessel Sigma Theta

double.name: airwaySigmaTheta
double.description: Airway sigma theta value for the TPS to particles optimization
double.label: Airway Sigma Theta

boolean.name: useLeftModeWeights
boolean.description: Set to 1 to use stored mode weights for initialization. Set to 0 otherwise.
boolean.label: Use left mode weights

boolean.name: useRightModeWeights
boolean.description: Set to 1 to use stored mode weights for initialization. Set to 0 otherwise.
boolean.label: Use right mode weights

integer.name: numIters
integer.description: Number of iterations to perform for Nelder-Mead simplex model fitting
integer.label: Number of Iterations
